name: Puzzle of Love
description:
You’re the world’s most renowned author of bestselling romance novels. Thousands of women greet you with screams and swoon at your pages. Now, they are hungry for your next great work, which you’ve promised will be your most passionate yet.

But your muse of love needs inspiration in order to create its next hit hot romance novel. To get your creative juices flowing, you must spend your free time seducing women in romantic adventures. Puzzle of Love is a match 3 dating sim where you use your writer’s wit to solve love puzzles and find the anime girlfriend of your dreams!

Create colorful combinations on the playing field to unlock girls. Access special items and toys to help your matching quest. Once you’ve matched a date, take her out and buy her presents. Then stick with her or look for someone else. There are always more fish in the sea.

Match your way into the perfect match – or even a whole book of matches. Craft your dream life of romance!

Features:

· A dating simulator with a beautiful Japanese art style
· A match 3 girlfriend game where you can unlock the girls of your dreams
· Enjoy a story-rich visual novel in the manga game style
· Unlock plot events to move closer to the finish line
· Watch the levels get harder and the rewards more satisfying as you pursue your ideal match!

Weave the best parts of your own love story into your next hot romance novel and bring your career as an author to a glorious climax!

Put your match 3 skills to the test in this captivating sexual game app created in the style of Japanese anime games. After countless hours of creation, we combed through our art to bring you only the hottest girls and the best play experience. The result is a dating simulator drenched with love stories, romantic moments, and cute anime girlfriends.

This is one story rich romance game you won’t delete after your first night with it. Start your girlfriend game collection, or if you already have a favorite, try an exciting affair with the new adult game Puzzle of Love.

Puzzle of Love is an adult dating game designed for men age 18+.
